name: aisling granny squares bag
sizes_available: one size: 8" w x 8" l x 12" h (not including strap)
notes:
> this pattern is available for [free on my blog][1]. the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern (including all photo tutorials + 2 bonus crochet stitch charts), in one printable file without advertisements.

the aisling granny squares bag is a charming, boho-inspired crochet tote made from two sizes of joined granny squares. with sturdy handles and a roomy design, it’s perfect for everyday use—whether you’re heading to the market, the beach, or a craft fair. play with color combinations and embellishments to make it uniquely yours!

**yarn**
lion brand yarns 24/7 cotton was used for the granny square tote bag shown in the photos.

crochet granny square bag design is an a crocheted simplicity original design.

join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases, giveaways, sales and testing opportunities: https://www.facebook.com/groups/906744872727855/

you can also find me on etsy (a crocheted simplicity) (jennifer renaud).

all of my patterns are written in standard american terms, unless noted otherwise.

please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds, however, i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions.
